#summary Changelog for VSD x86 & x64

v2.0 x86 - 01/04/2012[BR]
--[BR]

- Added a menu bar.[BR]
- Added a module list viewer.[BR]
- Added Dump Full and Dump Partial over a specific module.[BR]
- Added sorting feature in the module list viewer.[BR]
- Added a handle list viewer.[BR]
- Added sorting feature in the handle list viewer.[BR]
- Added a thread list viewer.[BR]
- Added Resume, Terminate and Suspend functions in the thread list viewer.[BR]
- Added the "Patch" feature.[BR]
- Bugfixes in some functions.[BR]
- Code refactoring in some functions. The code still needs a lot of improvements :P[BR]

v1.1 x86 - 16/02/2012
--

- Fixed a bug in the PastePEHeader() function when calculating the offset of the PE Header.

v1.0 x86 & x64 - 16/02/2012
